WRITING.TEXT: I initially liked the look of it too, especially on the driftwood, but it looks a bit yuck coming off the plants and the more it grows the longer those white/grey hairs get.

WRITING.TITLE: What is this algae and how do I get rid of it?

WRITING.TEXT: Cheers Its 16"x 12" and looking at other works similar in quality I would probably price it under $1000 I really suck at marketing myself so I can't imagine I'd ever sell this, especially not for the price I wanted.
I have no idea how to price something like this.
Yeah I can, you should check out some of my photography :)
I was pleasantly surprised, I thought it would be a total failure tbh. Sometimes a break is a good to refresh the creativity
Thanks, not directly from one of Bobs, but he was helpful when I started in oil.

WRITING.TITLE: Just finished my first oil painting in about 3 years. A seascape

WRITING.TEXT: HTC used 3 of my images (and paid me) for their standard wallpaper in all their HTC One phones. I was pretty chuffed at the time.
